channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Disastrous Year-End Push to Mandate Age Verification
item.description: It’s a policy unlikely to protect children and all but assured to endanger the data privacy of users of all ages and to violate the First Amendment.

item.title: Julie Su’s Late-astrophe
item.description: A last-minute push to confirm Biden’s acting secretary of labor ignores her latest mistakes in the position.

item.title: Merry Christmas
item.description: Christmas is a time that Americans of all faiths, or none, may devote to sharing deeper truths.

item.title: The Secret Geopolitics Of The Netflix Christmas Movie Universe
item.description: Behind Netflix's cocoa-sipping rom-com frippery must lie the hard Thucydidean realities of diplomacy and war.

item.title: WFB 100
item.description: This is our moment to ensure that Buckley’s vision endures.

item.title: Animosity Against Jews Demonstrates Leftist Icon Greta Thunberg’s Extremism
item.description: Thunberg has translated her climate stardom to highlight something she cares about more than the planet these days: attacking Israel.

item.title: Biden’s Lawfare by Other Means
item.description: Hawaii aims to punish out-of-state companies for national — indeed international — temperature changes. Biden’s Justice Department is aiding it.

item.title: The Incoming Congress Should Immediately Ban Zuckbucks Across The Nation
item.description: Voters gave Republicans a mandate on a range of issues. Fixing the problems that led to the 2020 election chaos is one of them.

item.title: The Hitchhiker’s Guide to failing to elect a House speaker quickly
item.description: On the first day of the new Congress, representatives will vote for the speaker of the House as Mike Johnson fights to keep the job.

item.title: Former presidential hopeful Marianne Williamson announces bid for DNC chair, looks to 'reinvent the party'
item.description: Former presidential hopeful Marianne Williamson announces a bid to become the next Democratic National Committee chair.

item.title: New bill would mandate gyms to carry equipment for Americans with disabilities
item.description: Congressional Democrats are pushing for a massive overhaul to regulatory policy concerning Americans with disabilities.

item.title: Texas man indicted in smuggling of dozens of illegal immigrants in locked tractor trailer
item.description: A Texas man is being charged with attempting to smuggle over 100 illegal immigrants into the U.S. in a locked tractor trailer.
